response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your endeavors. Considering its worth to us and its potential value to you, we propose a price of $12,000 for the product. We're confident this offer strikes a fair balance between the value we place on it and what you perceive its worth to be. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
